list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Update contact section with improved functionality
Updated the 'createContact' function in 'sections.js' to add contact section rendering. It includes 'createEmail', 'createPhone', and 'createForm' helper functions for creating associated HTML elements. Consequently, these updates enhance the form's interactivity and user experience. Also, the script reference in 'index.html' was updated from 'd.js' to 'sites.js'. A new 'form.js' script file has also been added, which includes a call to a 'build_form' function.

task.summary:
Add main section and JS script to index.html
This commit introduces a new 'main' section with the ID 'root' into the index.html structure for better content organization. Additionally, a JavaScript source file 'index.js' is referenced in index.html and created. This is a part of restructuring the code to adapt to a more component-based architecture.

Remove `hello.js` and restructure project with `index.html` and new `d.js`
Removed outdated `hello.js` file. Restructured project by adding main section and a JavaScript script to `index.html`. Introduced a new `d.js` file with a function to create a header. All these changes enhance content organization and orient the project towards a more component-based architecture.

Refactor project structure and remove outdated files
Project structure was updated to create clear separation between source code and root directory. To achieve this, files 'index.js' and 'd.js' were moved to a new 'src' folder. References to these scripts in 'index.html' were updated to reflect their new locations.
Additionally, 'hello.js' was removed from project as it has become outdated and is no longer required.
Simultaneously, PropertiesComponent in the workspace.xml was formatted.
These changes aim to streamline the project's structure and enhance its maintainability.

Refactor project structure and remove outdated files.
Reorganized project structure for clarity and maintainability by creating a new 'src' folder and moving 'index.js' and 'd.js' into it. This also required updating 'index.html' to correctly reference these scripts. 'hello.js' - an outdated file - was removed. Workspace.xml was likewise formatted, and a fresh task introduced in the local task counter. Additionally, a new file 'sections.js' was created exporting a 'COOKING_SITE' object and building site sections. Exporting the COOKING_SITE variable from 'index.js' was needed for this.

Refactor project structure and enhance section creation
Updated and refactored the project structure for clarity and maintainability, by segregating the files 'index.js' and 'd.js' into a new, dedicated 'src' folder. Simultaneously, the 'index.html' file was updated to reference these files correctly. The obsolete file 'hello.js' has been purged, while on the other hand 'sections.js' was added for building site sections. This reorganization required key modifications within workspace.xml, a step that forms part of task management improvement. To top this off, the COOKING_SITE variable from 'index.js' requires exporting.

Refactor section creation logic in sections.js
The logic for creating different types of sections (header, text, gallery, contact, links) for the COOKING_SITE in the sections.js file was refactored. The change involved introducing a utility function to create HTML elements and restructuring the section creation procedures into separate functions. The update improves code maintainability and makes the logic more scalable and flexible in anticipation of potential new types of sections in the future.

Refactor site sections creation for scalability
Refactored the logic for creating site sections in sections.js, introducing a utility function to create HTML elements and restructuring the section creation into separate functions. This improves code maintainability and makes the logic more scalable and flexible for potential future types of sections. Adjustments in index.html and index.js for consistency.

Refactor site sections creation for enhanced scalability
Simplified the logic for creating various sections of the site (header, text, gallery, etc.) within sections.js. A utility function was introduced for HTML elements creation, which led to separated and streamlined section creation procedures. This change significantly improves the code's maintainability and provides scalability, considering anticipated section additions in the future. Index.html and index.js were adjusted for overall consistency.

Add contact section rendering functionality
The 'createContact' function was updated to implement contact section rendering in 'sections.js'. This includes the addition of 'createEmail', 'createPhone', and 'createForm' helper functions for creating respective elements. Also, the script reference in 'index.html' was updated from 'd.js' to 'sites.js'.

Update contact section with improved functionality
Updated the 'createContact' function in 'sections.js' to add contact section rendering. It includes 'createEmail', 'createPhone', and 'createForm' helper functions for creating associated HTML elements. Consequently, these updates enhance the form's interactivity and user experience. Also, the script reference in 'index.html' was updated from 'd.js' to 'sites.js'. A new 'form.js' script file has also been added, which includes a call to a 'build_form' function.
